website_summaries.verdict: Offers Plato's natural, wholesome treats in a generous 22 oz. bag and a flavor dogs love.
pros: Offers a flavor that dogs go crazy over
Includes DHA that is reported to be beneficial to brain health
Chewy sticks that are easy to break – ideal for training
cons: A few reports of upset stomach, but many more happy customers and dogs
Not totally grain free –contains brown rice

customer_reviews.title: why big price change?
customer_reviews.text: not sure how to rate....... these snacks are actually excellent, my sensitive and picky dog loves them, but the price point just jumped from $22 to $35 in only a few weeks, and I'm now priced out of them. was there a sudden world wide shortage on ducks?
customer_reviews.author: GraceGiven

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality in bulk
customer_reviews.text: My Goldens love these duck thinkers that come in individually wrapped. They are supposed to have a pepperoni like texture to them but the batch I just ordered is totally over cooked, dried out, and crumbly. This is such a disappointment because the isncidually wrapped ones are amazing and perfect to use as a reward when doing the dogs’ nails and as a high value reward. I contacted the manufacturer who was incredibly slow to respond but I think the batch is really bad because this is not how the product is supposed to be. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jerky Treats arriving all Broken
customer_reviews.text: This is now the third order of Plato Dog treats that has come broken in a number of pieces. At 30 bucks a bag, I would expect them to come Whole as they should. Prior to three months ago this never happened, or there would only be a couple broken ones. Now they are literally broken in 1-2 inch pieces. Please fix this! Very disappointed in the lack of quality recently.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Safe and delicious treats!
customer_reviews.text: Well...I must tell you that I personally haven't tasted them!!! Our standard poodle, Abby, adores them and wags her tail with delight every time she sees me open the bag to give her one! That should be happy for you to know. I will attest to the quality of this product however, because we are VERY particular about food and treats for ALL of our pets and just have Abby recovering from liver trouble due to a food product purported to be fresh and organic, but has been exposed lately for serious problems with their foods. Fortunately Abby is recovering nicely and we are pleased with THINKERS enough to reorder right now before we run out!
customer_reviews.author: Zwyno

customer_reviews.title: Get these for high value reward!
customer_reviews.text: When we want our dogs to come in we holler "DUCK" and they come running!! You can break the sticks into smaller pieces to adjust for the size of the dog. The bag holds together well and keeps the sticks fresh. A must have for high value rewards!!
customer_reviews.author: hear it live

customer_reviews.title: It felt like saw dust in my hands when I broke it ...
customer_reviews.text: These came in very dry. Will not order again. It felt like saw dust in my hands when I broke it in half. My dogs ate them but Ithink it was due to whatever smell. Very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Dsma

customer_reviews.title: tasty treat
customer_reviews.text: The hound loves this tasty treat. I like that I can break the long treat into small bits to give multiple bites or use inside food dispensing toys. The package is easily re-sealable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gone, Lickety-Split!
customer_reviews.text: My Westie loves these and it is made from mostly duck meat in the USA so it is safe and good for him. Especially nice for dogs that tend to have allergies. They are pretty stinky though. He loves stinky treats because I can hide them from him and teach him to find them but you might not care for the smell. It isn't that bad though because he eats them lickety-split!
customer_reviews.author: cynlyn6

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only treats I give my dog. He LOVES them! Starts to drool as soon as he hears the bag open.
customer_reviews.author: tfigs121

customer_reviews.title: Yodel loves them!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only treats my dog will eat. He has allergies and is very sensitive to a lot of foods, and once I switched to these treats, his ear infections just stopped. They come in long sticks but easily snap to break into smaller pieces for a more reasonable treat size. I get them on subscription so we don't run out.
customer_reviews.author: SUZANNE K TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Great treat
customer_reviews.text: My dogs' new favorite treat. I also recently took these on a 2 week camping trip where I wasn't able to take wet food, since I couldn't keep it cool. My dog has been spoiled on me mixing wet food with dry, so he refused to eat his plain kibble the first day. I decided to cut one of these up and crumble it on his kibble, and it worked, he ate it up!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Love that this is GMO free and I can feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is GMO free and I can feel good about giving this to my dogs! I hope Plato doesn't get bought by Nestle, Purina, etc, like so many organic dog food companies have, because they have become my go-to company for healthy dog treats.
customer_reviews.author: S. F. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as good as earlier recipies.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. I don't like them as well as an earlier recipe that was not so flaky. These are dry, rolled up with the texture of dried out autumn leaves. They leave a mess. I cut them into pieces to prevent her from gaining too much weight and to reduce the crumbs on the floor after she eats.
customer_reviews.author: Susan  SAN

customer_reviews.title: Stale and Broken
customer_reviews.text: All sticks were broken into multiple pieces and stale! They also didn't smell like they normally do. Would not purchase again. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Dogmom96

customer_reviews.title: DOGS LOVE & BROKEN IN PIECES AS TREATS!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER FAST SHIPPING AND GREAT PRODUCT FOR THE DOGS. I BREAK INTO PIECES AS TREATS. THEY LOVE ALL OF THE THINKER FAVORITES.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ashman

customer_reviews.title: Doggie Crack
customer_reviews.text: My toy poodle loves these treats. She more or less discovered them herself wandering around a pet boutique in Chicago. I found her sniffing happily at a jar so I bought them. She has been hooked ever since. I feel guilty when I run out and have to give her something else. They are expensive but worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great for training!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! It is great for training; I am able to break off small pieces. Smells good too!
customer_reviews.author: N. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Best treat company ever!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! & they are delivered pretty quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Marino

customer_reviews.title: My 2 Yorkies love them. I break them in half and give ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Duck, Salmon and Chicken Treats. My 2 Yorkies love them. I break them in half and give them 1/2 a day. Love the all natural treats.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it, they get a bit dry after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it, and the ingredients are good for him compared to other treats. Only problem is that the sausages get dry after some time, so make sure you buy the right amount. I have a 30 pounds dog and next time I'll be buying a smaller size of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anj

customer_reviews.title: Reduced from Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Havanese goes nuts for these things. But my last 2 or 3 orders, the sticks have been really dry and hard. Not sure what's going on. Change of recipe?
customer_reviews.author: Appreciative Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: All three of my dogs go nuts for this...just wish it wasn't so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I didn't taste them but they seem unusually delicious to our chocolate lab
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is food motivated so he'll eat anything, but he really extra loves these duck sticks!
customer_reviews.author: Emily T. Cookson

customer_reviews.title: "You Boys Want A Stick?!"
customer_reviews.text: Our Westies love these. We always break them in half, giving only a half to each. They know where I keep them; they are the "special treat."
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: The dog gives these treats many tail wags!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves these! We have always bought the chicken but the duck was a hit as well. He gets really excited. They are easy to eat, no mess, no funny smell and a healthy snack for the dog! We only buy the plato treats!
customer_reviews.author: EmDC

customer_reviews.title: Stop thinking about it.  Order some now.
customer_reviews.text: These are the bomb. My dogs are crazy about these. They tried to convince me that Plato's really make them smarter, but I think they just like the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Charli Wordsmith

customer_reviews.title: A Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love these. Not the Salmon! Disgusting. Pups might like it but I can not tolerate.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes these
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes these and I feel they are a good quality treat. He is on the smaller side so I cut them in 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: It's tricky finding a good price, but I always check Amazon first
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog loves these (duck) and her sensitive tummy does not react to them. It's tricky finding a good price, but I always check Amazon first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This particular order was rancid
customer_reviews.text: If this is for the order I received Monday, the Thinkers Natural Duck Sticks I received were rancid. This is the first time I have found these treats to be unacceptable. I have made another order and hopefully it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: doucoc

customer_reviews.title: Even half a sausage makes a good treat.
customer_reviews.text: My dog just loves these. A bit pricey but guaranteed to get my dog back indoors. I just have to shake the bag and he comes running. Even half a sausage makes a good treat.
customer_reviews.author: Lmvander

customer_reviews.title: Big hit...a bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats!! A bit too expensive for daily use....I have to ration them :-)
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Loves to enjoy these with all the other Plato treats
customer_reviews.text: Another Plato treat that makes a big hit with my Basset. Loves to enjoy these with all the other Plato treats.
customer_reviews.author: Joan D Hauser

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DOG TREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Great item! My dogs, and their neighborhood doggie friends love them, too!!
customer_reviews.author: Mba78

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats and they are GMO free. Healthy product, reasonable price and very fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Good But Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these although they are very pricey. We could feed the filet mignon for less.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not for our dogs
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs would not eat them...our Yorkie threw up on them....the casing around the duck seems to be the problem. They may work for other dogs, but not ours. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Lil-Bit’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: All 3 dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs devour these. I break them up into 2 inch pieces and keep them in the "cookie jar".
customer_reviews.author: Janet Fouts

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Taste yummy according to my two cocker spaniels - they love these...a bit pricey but nice to know there aren't a lot of nasty things inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: While they smell terrible to us, the dogs love them.
customer_reviews.author: CClark359

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treat for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: My grandpuppy has eaten these for years. She always eats the entire treat because she loves them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The dog loves these and they are good for him.
customer_reviews.author: J.C. Stover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it, and the price is so much better than the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Better bargain than pet store prices!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrives quickly. One of my dogs favorite treats!
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: My dog’s favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these so much! Since she is smaller I usually break them in half for her.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie B.

customer_reviews.title: Pricing too high
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves the duck sticks more than the duck treats, but because if the pricing I've stopped buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Moi5646

customer_reviews.title: Great treats!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves them. You can even break apart the sticks into smaller pieces and put them in a toy to make them more interactive.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B

customer_reviews.title: Yummy to a Dog's Tummy
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs LOVE this product as does our neighbor's dog who visits more frequently now! Nuff said...
customer_reviews.author: Loves to Cook

customer_reviews.title: They make a great snack for him in the afternoon
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. They make a great snack for him in the afternoon. He's an 80 lb dog!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gjj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my dogs FAVORITE! She goes nuts for these! Great Quality and a good price through Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Leon Bates

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST TREATS.
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST TREATS...HANDS DOWN. MY BOXER ONLY EATS THESE AND HAS FOR 5 YEARS. I LOVE THAT THEY ARE SO NATURAL, I LOVE THEIR SIZE, I LOVE THAT THEY HAVE NO 'NO GMO'!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great and healthy dog treat. The only ones my dogs will eat.
customer_reviews.author: oc

customer_reviews.title: all 3 dogs love this flavor
customer_reviews.text: all 3 dogs love this flavor. glad it is only made in the usa because that is all I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Nunley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my dogs favorite! And so much cheaper than retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Mack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves these. I appreciate that they are made in the USA
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are obsessed with these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really love these. It's their favorite treat. I love that it's all natural too. Haven't been able to buy them for the past few months due to the skyrocket in price. $30 a bag is just absurd. Will have to find another all natural treat until these go back to $16 a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: duck sinkers
customer_reviews.text: pups are not crazy about duck treats. I have to cut them in half and hope they will take a bite . They want the original duck treats made in USA and are very hard to fine. Everything made in china, hardly any USA products.
customer_reviews.author: foxxianne

customer_reviews.title: love this, I have Kuvasz its one of their ...
customer_reviews.text: love this, I have Kuvasz its one of their favorite treats
customer_reviews.author: debbie m.

customer_reviews.title: they are paper like wrapped. my dogs wouldn't have anything to do ...
customer_reviews.text: they are paper like wrapped. my dogs wouldn't have anything to do with them. I peeled off the paper and they still were not interested. sorry my dogs are fussy. shitzus and spoiled at that.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great dog snack
customer_reviews.text: Schnauzers loved it and like eating these healthy meat sticks.
customer_reviews.author: John Davis

product_meta.title: Plato Dog Treats - Thinkers Natural Duck Sticks- 22 Oz
product_meta.description: Plato Pet Treats Duck Thinkers are FREE from added sugars, artificial preservatives, by-products, artificial colors, protein-meals, soy, wheat, corn, fillers, and freeze-drying. Slow roasted in our own US Facility, these treats can be snapped into pieces for training dogs of all sizes or to share. Plato Thinker Sticks are grain-reduced with gluten free brown rice being the only grain ingredient. Brain-nourishing natural DHA and EPA helps support brain function in your dog.
feature_bullets: Healthy Snack – Our Treats Have No Added Sugars, Artificial Preservatives, By-Products, Artificial Colors, Protein-Meals, Soy, Wheat, Corn, Fillers, Or Freeze-Drying.

Ingredients – Best All Natural Pet Treat On The Market. Plato Uses The Highest Percent Of Quality, Protein On The Market. Treats Are 90% Pure Meat. We Procure All Ingredients Straight From The Source. This Guarantees Plato Pet Treats Is The Most Healthy Dog Treat Made In The Usa.
Benefits & Recommendations– This Dog Snack Is Organic, Helps Digestion, Healthy Skin & Coat, And Circulation.
A Treat For Sensitive Pets - These Single-Source Novel Protein Treats Are Slow Roasted In Our Very Own Us Facility- Especially Good For Dogs With Skin Issues, Allergies, And Food Sensitivities.
Great For Training – Dogs Are Amazing, But Sometimes They Need A Little Training. One Of The Best Ways To Motivate Your Dog Or Puppy Is With A Treat That They Love! Canines Love Plato Dog Treats!
